name: Dream C Club Portable
overview: Hugely popular on the Xbox360, Dream Club is now ported to the Sony PSP. Now you can take your favorite hostess out. You have 1 year membership card to the club. Within this period, you have to earn your dream girl's love and reach the final kiss scene. Besides engaging in romantic activities, you can also join the Karaoke games and cosplay nights to unlock songs, costumes and CGs. Get to know them through the drinking game, they might spill their secrets to you during this time, so learn to get along with alcohol.
